price: نو هغه (بتان) يې د لوى (بت) نه پرته (ټول) ټوټه ټوټه كړل، چې ښايې بيا دوى هغه (لوى) ته ورشي.
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
